TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CompilerResults extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents the results of compilation that are returned from a compiler.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This class contains the following information about the results of a compilation by an <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler> interface implementation:
- The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults.CompiledAssembly%2A> property indicates the compiled assembly.
- The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults.Evidence%2A> property indicates the security evidence for the assembly.
- The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults.PathToAssembly%2A> property indicates the path to the compiled assembly, if it was not generated only in memory.
- The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults.Errors%2A> property indicates any compiler errors and warnings.
- The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults.Output%2A> property contains the compiler output messages.
- The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults.NativeCompilerReturnValue%2A> property indicates result code value returned by the compiler.
- The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults.TempFiles%2A> property indicates the temporary files generated during compilation and linking.
> [!NOTE] > This class contains an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members. A <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown when the derived class does not have full-trust permission. For details about inheritance demands, see [Inheritance Demands](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100)).
## Examples [!code-cpp[CompilerResultsExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerResultsExample/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CompilerResultsExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerResultsExample/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CompilerResultsExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerResultsExample/VB/class1.vb#1)]

Docs.permission: for full trust for inheritors. This class cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.

Attribute.AttributeName: set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the compiled assembly.
Docs.value: An that indicates the compiled assembly.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > The `get` accessor for the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults.CompiledAssembly%2A> property calls the <xref:System.AppDomain.Load%2A> method to load the compiled assembly into the current application domain. After calling the `get` accessor, the compiled assembly cannot be deleted until the current <xref:System.AppDomain> is unloaded.

Docs.permission: for full trust for the immediate caller. This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.

Docs.summary: Gets the collection of compiler errors and warnings.
Docs.value: A that indicates the errors and warnings resulting from compilation, if any.

remarks.format: ## Remarks File and line number information is associated with each <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerError>, so that user code to locate and display the code that generated an error or warning, where possible, can be implemented.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property contains the numeric exit code returned by a command line compiler, if implemented. A value of 0 indicates success, while a non-zero value indicates failure.
